AppMetadata.description: The official website of the INSA Toulouse Forum, the must-attend event for students and companies.
AppMetadata.keywords: INSA Forum, INSA Toulouse, Company Forum, Student Event, INSA Contact
AppMetadata.title: Forum By INSA

Specialities.GP3E: Process, Water, Energy and Environment Engineering

StudyLevelsDetails.ALTERNANCE_CONTRAT_PRO: 2-year contract in 4th year or 1-year contract in 5th year

HeroSection.backgroundImageAlt: Image of a group of people at a professional event

EventSection.imageOneAlt: Image of paper documents on a table during an interview
EventSection.imageTwoAlt: Image of a person at a company booth, giving explanations to a group of students
EventSection.title: A unique opportunity to network
EventSection.description: Booths, conferences, workshops, and above all, Job Dating! Students? Meet the companies shaping the future, interact with their representatives, and discover new professional opportunities. Companies? Benefit from an exceptional showcase to hundreds of students, and find talents during this immersive experience.

CarbonBalanceSection.title: An environmentally friendly framework
CarbonBalanceSection.description: The INSA Forum is committed to a sustainable future by prioritizing eco-responsible companies. Discover labelled companies that use green transportation and adopt environmentally friendly practices during their participation in the Forum.
CarbonBalanceSection.imageOneAlt: Image of a person planting a tree
CarbonBalanceSection.imageTwoAlt: Image of hands holding a half-globe with plants
CarbonBalanceSection.imageThreeAlt: Image of an electric car charging

SolidarityFundSection.title: Supporting student initiatives
SolidarityFundSection.description: The Solidarity Fund of the Forum By INSA aims to support student projects and assist them in their initiatives. Through crowdfunding, we help students thrive and bring their ideas to life.
SolidarityFundSection.imageAlt: Image of a jar containing coins and a young plant

EventPage.imageOneAlt: Image of a group of people at a professional event
EventPage.title: Join a unique event
EventPage.description: Looking for an internship, work-study program, or your first job? Or simply curious to discuss with professionals in your field? Register now for the Forum By INSA 2025!
EventPage.imageTwoAlt: Image of people discussing around a table in an amphitheater
EventPage.whyTitle: Why come to the Forum by INSA?
EventPage.whyItemOne: Land your 4th or 5th year internship within a company you like.
EventPage.whyItemTwo: Meet and discuss with HR professionals and engineers about your professional project.
EventPage.whyItemThree: Discover and learn about new topics during round tables, workshops and conferences.

EventRoomsPlanSection.planImageAlt: Image of the forum rooms located at {planLabel}
EventRoomsPlanSection.noCompanyAtThisLocation: No company is present at this location.

CompaniesPage.title: Companies
CompaniesPage.description: Discover all the prestigious companies participating in the Forum. Meet recruiters, explore internship and job opportunities, and prepare to shine your profile !
CompaniesPage.altText: Image of a group of people discussing around a table
CompaniesPage.cannotLoadCompanies: Unable to load the list of companies.
CompaniesPage.noCompanies: No registered company has been found.
CompaniesPage.companyGreenLabelDescription: Your heart in one glance! The companies with this label are those who are committed to environmental and durability by using eco-friendly transportation methods, and not providing goodies.
CompaniesPage.greenLabelTooltip: This company uses eco-friendly transportation methods and does not offer goodies.

CompanyDetailsPage.hasGreenLabelDescription: This company has the green label! It meets our environmental commitment criteria.
CompanyDetailsPage.noGreenLabelDescription: This company does not meet all our environmental commitment criteria, but this does not call into question its actions in favor of the environment.

CarbonBalancePage.imageOneAlt: Image of hands holding a half-globe with plants
CarbonBalancePage.imageTwoAlt: Abstract image representing data sheets pointing to different elements of the environment
CarbonBalancePage.title: Carbon Balance of the Forum By INSA 2025
CarbonBalancePage.description: We are committed to organizing a sustainable Forum, in an environmentally and socially responsible manner. Discover the environmental impact of our event through the carbon footprint of the companies during the Forum.
CarbonBalancePage.commitmentOne: We offer vegan meals during the event.
CarbonBalancePage.commitmentTwo: We encourage companies to use eco-friendly transportation methods to attend the event.
CarbonBalancePage.commitmentThree: We encourage companies to not distribute goodies to reduce waste.
CarbonBalancePage.commitmentFour: We make a carbon balance to measure and reduce the environmental impact of the event.
CarbonBalancePage.methodologyDescription: The carbon footprint was calculated following the official ADEME methodology, taking into account direct and indirect emissions related to the organization of the Forum. We collected precise data on travel, purchases made, energy consumed, and much more.
CarbonBalancePage.companiesRankingDescription: Discover the ranking of companies participating in the Forum By INSA 2025, based on their carbon footprint related to their participation in the Forum.
CarbonBalancePage.theForumGreenLabelDescription: The green label is awarded to companies that demonstrate a strong commitment to environmental sustainability. To obtain this label, companies must prioritize eco-friendly transportation methods for their travel, minimize their purchases and energy consumption by avoiding goodies, and adopt environmentally friendly practices in all their activities related to the Forum.
CarbonBalancePage.ourPartnerDescription: Kaba Impact is supporting us in carrying out our Carbon Balance in 2025, using the ADEME methodology. We are proud to collaborate with them to ensure the reliability of our balance and identify impactful actions for future editions.

CarbonBalanceRankingTable.tableDescription: Ranking of companies by carbon footprint
CarbonBalanceRankingTable.noCompanies: No registered company has been found.

SolidarityFundPage.imageAlt: Image of a person posing blocks on a surface resembling a website
SolidarityFundPage.title: You are interested in the Solidarity Fund of the Forum By INSA?
SolidarityFundPage.description: This page is under construction. Please come back later for more information on the Solidarity Fund, or contact us now.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us!
ContactPage.description: You have any question or need assistance? Our team is there to help. Fill the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.imageAlt: Image of a person with a laptop

ContactForm.emailErrorMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
ContactForm.phoneErrorMessage: Please enter a valid phone number.
ContactForm.confirmationMessage: Confirmation of receipt of your message
ContactForm.successMessage: Your message has been successfully sent.
ContactForm.successDescription: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

BrochureSection.imageAlt: Cover image of the Forum By INSA 2025 brochure

JobteaserSection.imageAlt: Image of a group of people following a conference

Footer.about: The INSA Forum is an annual event organized by INSA Toulouse students, aimed at connecting students with companies and promoting professional opportunities. For more information, please contact us via the contact form.

FooterContactForm.emailErrorMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
